name: Supreme Sea Mare
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Aqua monster from your Deck to your GY, except "Supreme Sea Mare". During your End Phase: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 Aqua monster in your GY, except "Supreme Sea Mare"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Supreme Sea Mare" once per turn.
